PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-13722022-12-16,  ,  DND,  , 
ActNational Defence Act
PrecisAppointment of VIHAR JOSHI, K.C., of Ottawa, Ontario, to be interim Chairperson of the Military Grievances External Review Committee, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of one year or until such time as a new Chairperson is appointed, whichever occurs first.
AttachmentsAttachment
